cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 370 miles ESE of Cozumel, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating northwest through the Yucatan, then north-northwest across the Gulf toward the Louisiana coast and inland across MS/AL by the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast (near Vermilion Bay/Cameron area)

port.name: Port of Greater Baton Rouge, LA

weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (40–60 mph) likely; hurricane-force gusts possible if the core tracks closer.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 3–7 ft surge possible along lower Mississippi River and adjacent coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: 4–8 inches with locally higher amounts could cause flash flooding around the port and upriver.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes in outer rainbands, dangerous river currents and debris.
